parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 0.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Compile expression and makes it final, preventing it from:
* repeated [[compile]] or [[compileFinal]]
* removal by [[nil]]
* remote rewrite using [[publicVariable]], [[publicVariableClient]] and [[publicVariableServer]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This feature is only available in retail version of Arma 3</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''compileFinal''' expression

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> expression: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Code]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myCode <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> compileFinal "a <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> a + 1"; 
[[call]] myCode;<br> 
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Repeated compile won't have any effect</value></part></template>
myCode <template><title>=</title></template> compileFinal "a <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> a + 2";<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Duplicate code will be final as well</value></part></template>
myDuplicateCode = myCode;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[compile]], [[call]], [[spawn]], [[isFinal]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 14, 2013</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:AgentRev01|AgentRev]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
When broadcasting a compileFinal'ed variable using [[publicVariable]] or its variants, the variable also becomes final on the other client(s) and/or the server.
Also, compileFinal does not prevent [[Event_handlers|event handlers]] from being removed or overwritten.</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 27, 2017 - 11:58 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
in Arma 3 1.70.141838, compileFinal also works for profileNamespace and uiNamespace. But be careful with that.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 23, 2020 - 10:39 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Dscha|Dscha]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Change with Arma 3 Patch [https://dev.arma3.com/post/spotrep-00095 2.00], [[compileFinal]] is now '''unable''' to store code type variables in profileNamespace!

</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
